column2: Dwarf]] from [[Durin's Folk]] who travelled [[Eriador]] to fight spiders. He eventually went to [[Archet]] to aid it's people against spiders settled in ''The Old East Pass'', near Archet's east gate,<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Spiders at the Walls''</ref> and who had over-run [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley
column3: Cal Sprigley]]'s farm.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''A Threat from Spiders''</ref>
